allocated_minutes.description: The calculated sum of the assignment's Story Allocation Day minutes.

assignee_id.description: `assignee_id` will only be included in the response if `assignee` is in the list of included associations. See include section for usage.

estimated_minutes.description: The estimated number of minutes that the resource is expected to work on this task.

resource_id.description: The ID of the resource who owns the assignment.

story_allocation_day_ids.description: `story_allocation_day_ids` will only be included in the response if `story_allocation_days` is in the list of included associations. See include section for usage.

story_id.description: `story_id` will only be included in the response if `story` is in the list of included associations. See include section for usage.
